website_summaries.verdict: Offers variety and top-quality grain-free food in a canned formula that most dogs love.
pros: A pack of 12 cans that includes a variety of flavors: Wetlands, Pacific Stream, High Prairie, and Sierra Mountain
Formulated for all stages with animal protein, fruits, and vegetables
Owners have commented that their dogs can't get enough, and prefer it over dry kibble
cons: Some reports of diarrhea, and of dogs not liking all of the varieties in the case

customer_reviews.title: I was expecting three cans of each variety. I ...
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting three cans of each variety. I got five Pacific Stream, four High Prairie, three Sierra Mountain, and zero Wetlands in the pack. I don't mind spending a few dollars more to give my pup some variety, but this irks me a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly J. Ytudell

customer_reviews.title: Good dog food, but buy in-store. Where UPS/amazon can’t destroy your cans
customer_reviews.text: this review isn’t for the product itself. taste of the wild is great and it’s a shame to taint it with a 2 star review because the seller/shipping wasn’t up to par with the product. Cans arrived all bent. What a shame.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Young

customer_reviews.title: 1st order great, reorder not as good
customer_reviews.text: While I received the order promptly, out of the 12 cans of food, 5 cans were damaged 1 of them badly enough that it had to be tossed out without using. It appeared that the whoever packed the box had picked mostly damaged and dented cans for this particular box, the box itself was undamaged but the cans inside were damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Priced very high
customer_reviews.text: I have been supplementing my dogs kibble with this for about 6 months. I liked the idea of just being able to order it online and having it delivered. I was down at the feed store the other day and discovered that I can get it for $10/case cheaper by buying locally.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made Dog Sick
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what happened, but some of this food seemed to give my dog stomach problems. I’ve been giving him this food for a while, but it was cheaper to buy on Amazon in bulk. Have gone back to buying it from brick and mortar options. Spending the extra money is worth my baby’s health.
customer_reviews.author: cats_bell

customer_reviews.title: Premium Chow for a Hungry Lab
customer_reviews.text: A couple of tablespoons mixed in with dry kibble - this is the treat in every bowl for our guy. Seems to agree with him - no side effects. He is lab and known to eat about anything but really gets excited when he sees us pull the can from the refrigerator - so I let him be the judge --- he seems quite pleased so 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Checkimage

customer_reviews.title: His primary food
customer_reviews.text: My 4-legged son had been using Taste of the Wild for years. He is going on 10, a healthy weight, and doing well.
customer_reviews.author: John Pierre-Benoist

customer_reviews.title: Great Dog food
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. This was first time I ordered it from here, I couldn't be more pleased. Fast and easy as I only had to carry them inside from porch. We purchased canned to start supplimenting it with TOTW Dry for our older dog. He has been with this brand of food for over 9 years. He is a healthy, active, Frisbee loving old dog and I give this good food alot of that credit!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dented Cans
customer_reviews.text: Cans were all dented but the carton they were in (and the shipping box) were not damaged. Must of been packed dented.Food inside was fine, but for the price I would expect better.
customer_reviews.author: llorance

customer_reviews.title: Every can arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Every can in the last shipment I received was significantly dented. One was so dented that dog food had begun to leak from the top. The cans were shrink wrapped together and then placed in a box. Appeared that the cans were damaged prior to shrink wrapping because even the can in the middle were damaged. Many times a can or two gets dented but this time every single can arrived damaged.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in reorder.
customer_reviews.text: Love the food, not the price! First time I ordered I choose 2 packages (24 cans) and that's what I received. So, when it came time to reorder I went to my past orders and hit "Reorder again", thinking I'd get the same thing, 24 cans. NO, it seems the quantity of the order changed to 12 cans. The price was still the same so I thought I was getting the same as before. VERY DISAPPOINTING!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Eh.
customer_reviews.text: My dog hates the gravy, I found myself rinsing off the meat before feeding her. Ended up switching to Stella and Chewy's. But if your dog isn't picky like mine, it's a pretty good brand.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Waldman

customer_reviews.title: Great product, a tad much on the wallet
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves it as an addition to the dry food but unfortunately it's just too pricey to be given daily along with the dry food that is already given to him. Otherwise it's great and it looks like it has different ingredients, the meat kinda looks the same but I didn't hear any complaints from my dog, so no complains here.
customer_reviews.author: J.Cotto

customer_reviews.title: This Product is not what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: My dog just will not eat this regardless of how I present it to her. She's very picky eater. I will not order again. However I did give the dog food to my daughter. Her dog does eat it.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Gaines

customer_reviews.title: Healthy and my dogs love it
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love all four varieties of this and it more closely matches their wild diet-- love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality 😢 💔
customer_reviews.text: Well at least in my experience for how much money this brand of wet dog food cost was very poor. It didn't matter the flavor, every can was a gross brown weird smelling goop. It all looked the same. And this is a good brand of food- I was expecting a lot better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Melsa

customer_reviews.title: Alerts that chicken/ fowl is included.
customer_reviews.text: I girls cannot handle the fowl ingredients in this product. The bison and beef fine. Need alerts that fowl is included.
customer_reviews.author: Geraldine Lowry

customer_reviews.title: My dog did not like the taste
customer_reviews.text: I bought a variety flavor case (12 cans) and my dog ate several cans but after that he decided he did not like it. So I think it is just a matter of taste. Buy one can only of each flavor to see if your dog actually likes it. I have about six cans left that he will not eat, and apparently I cannot return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Good product according to Whole Dog Journal, and my dog likes it. Win-win if you ask me. Also got an email from one of their people asking if I had received my package, since it was later than expected. They seem to care about their customers, and I like that, too.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Kj

customer_reviews.title: My dogs hate this, which is surprising
customer_reviews.text: My dogs hate this, which is surprising, based upon the previous love of the Taste of the Wild dry food. This canned product has chunks that are too large for them to eat easily. The potatoe chunks and peas are completely ignored. Donating the rest of my order to the ASPCA
customer_reviews.author: A. Morton

customer_reviews.title: Dogs did not like the food
customer_reviews.text: My Digs would not eat any flavor of this food. They Love can foo and with gravy. Out of 4 dogs, none would eat it. Never had this problem before. Sorry the product did not work out.
customer_reviews.author: Buggy D

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for my dog
customer_reviews.text: Taste of the Wild is very good, but I strongly recommend dry food. This canned just made my dog had diarrhea and was feeling not so good after dry food went out and had to gave him this.
customer_reviews.author: Haris

customer_reviews.title: A Superior Dog Food
customer_reviews.text: My 2 Karelian Bear Dogs, now age 10, have eaten Taste of the Wild canned dog food since they were just 1 year young. They absolutely chow it down! They also eat the Taste of the Wild dry food. My Vet agrees it is a superior brand as well. Tails a waggin' dog gone happy dogs !
customer_reviews.author: CvW

customer_reviews.title: Dogs eat it!
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a little moist topping on dry food for my 2 Airedale’s. They eat it just fine, but I think it’s a bit expensive.
customer_reviews.author: BJB56

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smells terrible. Didn’t agree with my dog’s sensitive tummy. Supposed to be high end, just didn’t work with mine.
customer_reviews.author: Julia & John

customer_reviews.title: kind of disappointed. I will not purchase again
customer_reviews.text: My 7 months chocolate lab puppy likes the food but after feeding him 2 cans, he had diarrhea and vomit. I mixed the can food with his normal dry food...kind of disappointed. I will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Angeleno

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!
customer_reviews.text: Didn't taste it myself but it smells good and my 18# Rat Terrier X really likes it! I mix it with her TOTW small kibble dry food :)
customer_reviews.author: Maggie D

customer_reviews.title: Extreme shedding while on this food
customer_reviews.text: Our dog started shedding like crazy after we fed her this food. They say the food has no poultry but the ingredients list chicken meal. Woll not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Dalemele

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful food
customer_reviews.text: We received a gift basket of your products and loved them so we’ll that I ordered the canned food. Our dogs go bonkers over it. The fact that they are made from wonderful Whole Foods and not by products and grain fillers means a lot to me. You’ve made a faithful customer of me!
customer_reviews.author: gretchen dysart

customer_reviews.title: Great Dog Food
customer_reviews.text: I gave the review on "flavor" 5 stars; however, I have to go by how my dogs love the taste. I haven't tried it. My furbabies have been on Taste of the Wild dry and wet food for years and they are doing great
customer_reviews.author: Joan E. Scholl

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it !
customer_reviews.text: Started giving it to my French bulldog and he loves it!. At first I was afraid of changing his food but now he can’t wait to eat it and it hasn’t cause any allergies to my dog. I will definitely buy again once’s it runs out
customer_reviews.author: andres otero

customer_reviews.title: Quick Delivery
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was quick but 7 of twelve cans were dented. All usable and in use by date code (2023). Just appears to have been pulled off the shelf or production line as not in pristine condition.
customer_reviews.author: RonP

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good for Rottweilers
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this product, I am too busy to review ingredients, hence not sure about true quality.
customer_reviews.author: LGLife

customer_reviews.title: Eh...
customer_reviews.text: Hmmm... Doesn't look at high quality as my regular brand. I will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Hedwall

customer_reviews.title: Picky Pups
customer_reviews.text: my westies love this mixed in with their dry food
customer_reviews.author: linda donithan

customer_reviews.title: my dogs got the. RUNS
customer_reviews.text: I dislike the product it gave my old English bulldog and my labradoodle got the runs it is all gravy based and not pate I should of read it better if ur dog hates gravy based definitely do not buy
customer_reviews.author: Ron murray

customer_reviews.title: Good product, received it in good time .
customer_reviews.text: Use it for my dogs with their dry food. They love it!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: \my dog loves it.
customer_reviews.text: my dog had basically stopped eating. tried taste of the wild, now he eating like crazy. i am happy and so is Scruffy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customermkiike

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love this food
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs have gotten the dry dog food for over a year and love it. I thought i would try the wet food and it was a big success
customer_reviews.author: Horst Hummes

customer_reviews.title: 6 of the 12 cans were heavily dented
customer_reviews.text: Dogs were not impressed, didnt eat much of it. And the cans were dented as if they wanted to get them off the shelves. would like my money back
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: Haven't tasted it myself, but my collie has been eating it for 5 years and seems very happy with it mixed in with Taste of the Wild dry food.
customer_reviews.author: Charles B. Kelley

customer_reviews.title: H wouldn't eat it
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, my Wire Fox Terrier would not eat this food. So, I cannot speak to its taste, etc. My dog is an exceptionly picky eater. Still looking for something high quality that he likes.
customer_reviews.author: Michael G. Huff, EA

customer_reviews.title: he has a great coat and he is now acting like a puppy
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves it, he has a great coat and he is now acting like a puppy again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.text: Would of been nice if the package wasn't lost and I actually got the dog food...
customer_reviews.author: William Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Healthy and delicious (or so my dog says)
customer_reviews.text: Good quality food, and my picky pet snarfs it up.
customer_reviews.author: A.E.

customer_reviews.title: I just received the product on the night it was supposed to be here.
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea that there is a variety of flavors mixed in one box. I only have one dog and limited space to store his food. I don't have room to keep 3 different boxes of canned food at one time.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Best high quality food!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this canned food. Tried many other brands, this is the best
customer_reviews.author: Joy Carrier

customer_reviews.title: Was pleased with the high ratings of the quality of the food
customer_reviews.text: While haven’t consumer the product, my buddy Henry , seems to enjoy it quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Only received two kinds
customer_reviews.text: Expected three cans each of four different flavors, got six cans each of two flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: the dogs like the variety of food for a snack with their dry food.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Lambourne

customer_reviews.title: Buffy Loves It
customer_reviews.text: Buffy told me she loves this stuff and always asks for more. Licks her dish dry!
customer_reviews.author: Papa Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Happy Chihuahua
customer_reviews.text: My toothless Chihuahua loves the selection that comes in this pack.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smelled like cardboard
customer_reviews.text: My Yorkie and Brewster turn away from it and eat their dry food instead.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Great variety
customer_reviews.text: Glad I found a variety pack for a decent price. My Husky loves all the flavors!
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten F.

customer_reviews.title: Your dog will love it
customer_reviews.text: My dog ​​loves him. He eats it in seconds. Good quality and price. The meat is very tender and juicy. He has changed his coat to a healthy and shiny.
customer_reviews.author: Alex24

customer_reviews.title: This food causes diarrhea!
customer_reviews.text: This food gave my dog terrible diarrhea. Our vet told us they hear this a lot about this brand of food. Use cautiously.
customer_reviews.author: COMendoza

customer_reviews.title: Great Taste of the Wild!
customer_reviews.text: My dog Roscoe is very picky. But he eats taste of the wild.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Merz

customer_reviews.title: Damaged (dented) cans!
customer_reviews.text: While I have not tried to food yet, I did want to point out the condition in which the cans arrived. The box was fine, not smashed at all. But 3 of the 12 cans (all lamb) are dented so badly. This is interesting because they were all in a different location in the undamaged box, which means they were put into the box in this defective condition. I’m a bit upset because I go out of my way to never buy dented cans for my family or my pet. Please don’t ship damaged cans!
customer_reviews.author: SB~Frances

customer_reviews.title: Are we the only ones who didn't get VARIETY?
customer_reviews.text: Might have been great if we had received the variety pack. Our dogs love Taste of the Wild. Just seems this distributor made a boo-boo!
customer_reviews.author: CO Mtn. Lady

customer_reviews.title: 4 of the cans arrived totally dented and when I ...
customer_reviews.text: 4 of the cans arrived totally dented and when I try to process a return it won't let me.
customer_reviews.author: Summer Holcomb

customer_reviews.title: Making dogs sick
customer_reviews.text: Please pull this product. It is making dogs ill according to consumer reports we just read. Our dog is now ill, hope we caught it in time. Do not buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

product_meta.title: Taste of the Wild Grain-Free Canned Dog Food Variety Pack - Wetlands, Pacific Stream, High Prairie, and Sierra Mountain Pack of 12, 13.2 Ounce cans
feature_bullets: Contains 3 cans of each Flavor: Wetlands, Pacific Stream, High Prairie, Sierra Mountain
Grain-Free formulas provide excellent nutrition without the grains
Each formula is prepared with unique animal protein sources
Fruits and vegetables provide natural vitamins, minerals, and have strong antioxidant properties

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
